level.heading: Person entitled to enforce instrument.
level.text: "Person entitled to enforce" an instrument means (i) the holder of the instrument, (ii) a nonholder in possession of the instrument who has the rights of a holder, or (iii) a person not in possession of the instrument who is entitled to enforce the instrument pursuant to section 28:3-309 or 28:3-418(d). A person may be a person entitled to enforce the instrument even though the person is not the owner of the instrument or is in wrongful possession of the instrument.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 28:3-103, § 28:3-308, and § 28:4-104.
